00067 class bool_array
00068 {
00069 public:
00070 #if (defined(__x86_64) || defined(__ia64) || defined(__ppc64__) || \
00071      defined(_WIN64) || defined(_M_IA64)) && \
00072     !(defined(_LP64) || defined(__lp64))
00073 
00074     typedef unsigned long long  size_type;
00075 #else
00076 
00077     typedef unsigned long       size_type;
00078 #endif
00079 
00080 private:
00082     typedef unsigned char       byte;
00083 
00085     template <typename _Byte_type>
00086     class _Element
00087     {
00088     public:
00089         _Element(_Byte_type* pointer, size_type pos);
00090         bool operator=(bool value);
00091         operator bool() const;
00092     private:
00093         _Byte_type* _M_byte_ptr;
00094         size_t      _M_byte_pos;
00095         size_t      _M_bit_pos;
00096     };
00097 
00098 public:
00099     typedef _Element<byte> reference;              
00100     typedef _Element<const byte> const_reference;  
00101 
00102 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && _MSC_VER < 1300
00103     enum { npos = (size_type)-1   };
00104 #else
00105 
00106     static const size_type npos = (size_type)-1;
00107 #endif
00108 
00109     bool_array();
00110     explicit bool_array(size_type size);
00111     bool_array(const void* ptr, size_type size);
00112     ~bool_array();
00113 
00114     bool_array(const bool_array& rhs);
00115     bool_array& operator=(const bool_array& rhs);
00116

00118     void initialize(bool value);
00119 
00120     reference operator[](size_type pos);
00121     const_reference operator[](size_type pos) const;
00122 
00123     bool at(size_type pos) const;
00124     void reset(size_type pos);
00125     void set(size_type pos);
00126 
00127     size_type size() const;
00128     size_type count() const;
00129     size_type count(size_type begin, size_type end = npos) const;
00130     size_type find(bool value, size_type offset = 0) const;
00131     size_type find(bool value, size_type offset, size_type count) const;
00132     size_type find_until(bool value, size_type begin, size_type end) const;
00133

00137                    size_type begin = 0,

00145 
00146     static size_t get_num_bytes_from_bits(size_type num_bits);

00149     byte get_8bits(size_type offset, size_type end) const;

00151     byte*           _M_byte_ptr;

00158 /* Inline functions */
00159 
00166 template <typename _Byte_type>
00167 inline bool_array::_Element<_Byte_type>::_Element(
00168         _Byte_type* pointer,
00169         size_type pos)
00170 {
00171     _M_byte_ptr = pointer;
00172     _M_byte_pos = (size_t)(pos / 8);
00173     _M_bit_pos  = (size_t)(pos % 8);
00174 }
00175 
00182 template <typename _Byte_type>
00183 inline bool bool_array::_Element<_Byte_type>::operator=(bool value)
00184 {
00185     if (value)
00186         *(_M_byte_ptr + _M_byte_pos) |= 1 << _M_bit_pos;
00187     else
00188         *(_M_byte_ptr + _M_byte_pos) &= ~(1 << _M_bit_pos);
00189     return value;
00190 }
00191 
00197 template <typename _Byte_type>
00198 inline bool_array::_Element<_Byte_type>::operator bool() const
00199 {
00200     return *(_M_byte_ptr + _M_byte_pos) & (1 << _M_bit_pos) ? true : false;
00201 }
00202 
00206 inline bool_array::bool_array() : _M_byte_ptr(NULL), _M_length(0)
00207 {
00208 }
00209 
00213 inline bool_array::~bool_array()
00214 {
00215     if (_M_byte_ptr != NULL)
00216         free(_M_byte_ptr);
00217 }
00218 
00225 inline bool_array::reference bool_array::operator[](size_type pos)
00226 {
00227     assert(_M_byte_ptr);
00228     assert(pos < _M_length);
00229     return reference(_M_byte_ptr, pos);
00230 }
00231 
00238 inline bool_array::const_reference bool_array::operator[](size_type pos) const
00239 {
00240     assert(_M_byte_ptr);
00241     assert(pos < _M_length);
00242     return const_reference(_M_byte_ptr, pos);
00243 }
00244 
00252 inline bool bool_array::at(size_type pos) const
00253 {
00254     size_t byte_pos, bit_pos;
00255     if (pos >= _M_length)
00256         throw std::out_of_range("invalid bool_array position");
00257     byte_pos = (size_t)(pos / 8);
00258     bit_pos  = (size_t)(pos % 8);
00259     return *(_M_byte_ptr + byte_pos) & (1 << bit_pos) ? true : false;
00260 }
00261 
00268 inline void bool_array::reset(size_type pos)
00269 {
00270     size_t byte_pos, bit_pos;
00271     if (pos >= _M_length)
00272         throw std::out_of_range("invalid bool_array position");
00273     byte_pos = (size_t)(pos / 8);
00274     bit_pos  = (size_t)(pos % 8);
00275     *(_M_byte_ptr + byte_pos) &= ~(1 << bit_pos);
00276 }
00277 
00284 inline void bool_array::set(size_type pos)
00285 {
00286     size_t byte_pos, bit_pos;
00287     if (pos >= _M_length)
00288         throw std::out_of_range("invalid bool_array position");
00289     byte_pos = (size_t)(pos / 8);
00290     bit_pos  = (size_t)(pos % 8);
00291     *(_M_byte_ptr + byte_pos) |= 1 << bit_pos;
00292 }
00293 
00299 inline bool_array::size_type bool_array::size() const
00300 {
00301     return _M_length;
00302 }
00303 
00313 inline bool_array::size_type bool_array::find(
00314         bool value,
00315         size_type offset) const
00316 {
00317     return find_until(value, offset, _M_length);
00318 }
00319 
00331 inline bool_array::size_type bool_array::find(
00332         bool value,
00333         size_type offset,
00334         size_type count) const
00335 {
00336     return find_until(value, offset, offset + count);
00337 }
00338 
00345 inline size_t bool_array::get_num_bytes_from_bits(size_type num_bits)
00346 {
00347     return (size_t)((num_bits + 7) / 8);
00348 }
